game.name: Alice's World
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Alice's World is a story-driven 2D adventure puzzle game. Amidst desolate ruins and deserted cities in a world filled with death, the young girl Alice hears "your" voice from in front of the screen. You must guide her forward, solve the mysteries, and reach the top of the tower.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Alice's World is a story-driven 2D adventure puzzle game. Amidst desolate ruins and deserted cities in a world filled with death, the young girl Alice hears "your" voice from in front of the screen. You must guide her forward, solve the mysteries, and reach the top of the tower.
game.publishers: STORIA GAMES CO., LTD, Flashlight Games

reviewHighlights.text: 스팀 설치 후 처음으로 엔딩까지 본 게임. 엄청나게 여운 남는 게임. 그저 그뿐. 그러나, 그것이 전부.
